name: Texas (WRMHOLE)
description:
It is a sunny afternoon in the late summer. The time is 4:53 p.m. and the biggest bank in Texas closed 53 minutes ago. All the staff have left the building and the guards have not arrived yet. It is now green light for Joe Gangster to make his way into the bank and get some cash!

Note: this game was not made with HTML5 in mind and can therefore suffer from lag and stuttering. To play the game the way it was intended, please download the .exe version.
